headline: Dow's 468-point drop led by losses in shares of 3M, IBM
summary: Dow's 468-point drop led by losses in shares of 3M, IBM

headline: 3 Large-Cap Stocks That Concern Us
summary: Large-cap stocks usually command their industries because they have the scale to drive market trends. The flip side though is that their sheer size can limit growth as expanding further becomes an increasingly challenging task.
